backend/main.mo: Defines watermark config storage and exposes endpoints for saving configs and converting DOCX to PDF using an HTTP outcall.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature reports, associated files, components, and test IDs for Word-to-PDF and related tooling updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Reusable ad placeholder component supporting multiple size variants.
frontend/src/components/blog/blogPosts.t: Defines blog post metadata and exports the list of posts.
frontend/src/components/faq/ToolFaq.tsx: Renders a FAQ section using an accordion with provided items.
frontend/src/components/home/BlogPreview: Displays the two latest blog posts with links and a button to view all posts.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Homepage hero section with headline, description, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeFaq.tsx: Homepage FAQ section showing common questions using an accordion.
frontend/src/components/home/toolsCatalo: Defines the Tool interface and exports a catalog of PDF, image, and conversion tools with metadata.
frontend/src/components/home/ToolsGrid.t: Displays a grid of tool cards from TOOLS_CATALOG and navigates to each tool’s route.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with tool links, resources, trust notes, and a URL copy button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Provides a responsive navigation bar with links and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the global page layout including navbar, footer, sidebar ads, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/seo/RelatedTools: Shows a list of related tools based on tool IDs with links and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Applies SEO metadata using useSeoMeta and renders nothing visually.
frontend/src/components/tools/image/Imag: UI for configuring image resize options including pixel, percentage, or target size modes with aspect ratio control.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/ImageT: Form for choosing PDF page size, image fit mode, and margins when converting images to PDF.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Remove: Inputs for specifying PDF pages to remove with examples and optional total page count display.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Resize: UI for selecting a target page size to resize an existing PDF.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Waterm: Config panel for setting watermark text, style, position, opacity, rotation, and font options.
Canvas‑based live preview showing how the configured watermark will appear in a PDF.
frontend/src/components/tools/processors: Re‑exports the pdfToWordProcessor from its module.
Client-side PDF-to-Word converter using pdf-lib and docx, loading libraries dynamically and generating placeholder text per page.
Resizes images using canvas with modes for pixel size, percentage, or target file size, including quality adjustment and progress updates.
Adds customizable text watermarks to each PDF page using pdf-lib, supporting fonts, positioning, rotation, and progress tracking.
Performs basic client-side PDF compression via pdf-lib by re-saving with optimized settings and reporting size changes.
Converts one or more images to a PDF, embedding JPG/PNG files and fitting them to A4 or Letter pages with configurable modes and margins.
Re-exports all PDF processor modules and related types for unified access.
Merges multiple PDFs client-side by copying pages into a new document using pdf-lib with progress updates.
Defines standard page sizes and a helper to retrieve their dimensions.
Deprecated backend PDF client containing nonfunctional placeholders now replaced by client-side pdf-lib processing.
Client-side PDF utility module that loads pdf-lib from CDN, validates files, reads PDFs, and provides helpers like page counting and progress updates.
Implements PDF page removal by loading the file, validating ranges, copying remaining pages, and outputting a new PDF.
Resizes each PDF page to a target page size, scaling and centering content before generating a new PDF.
Splits a PDF into individual pages and packages them into a ZIP file using pdf-lib and JSZip.
frontend/src/components/tools/SelectedFi: Displays selected file items with type and size, optionally allowing removal.
Defines structured tool errors and provides logic to normalize errors and produce user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolExperi: Manages the full tool workflow including upload, options, progress, errors, and result display.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolNextSt: Shows a temporary highlighted callout prompting the user to proceed to the next step.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPageSh: Provides a standard page shell with title, description, and content layout for tool pages.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPrimar: A styled primary action button supporting loading states and optional icons.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolResult: Displays a success message and button to download the generated file.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolSecond: A secondary action button with optional icon and variant styling.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolStepIn: Renders a 3‑step progress indicator showing upload, settings, and download states with visual highlighting.
frontend/src/components/tools/UploadDrop: Provides a drag‑and‑drop file uploader with type/size validation and selected file management.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustNotes: UI component displaying trust and security notes with icons about privacy, no login, and fast processing.
frontend/src/config/toolLimits.ts: Defines file size limits and standardized error messages for various tool operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, auto-refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMeta.ts: Updates document title and description meta tag based on provided title and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useToolJob.ts: Manages job state for processing tools, including progress, results, errors, and a wrapper to run async jobs.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode, prose styling, and utility classes for tool sections.
frontend/src/lib/base64.ts: Utilities for converting between File, base64, Uint8Array, and Blob formats.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Triggers browser-safe file downloads using Blob URLs with mobile-friendly cleanup timing.
frontend/src/lib/fileFormat.ts: Formats file sizes and provides human-friendly file type labels based on MIME type or extension.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogIndexPage.ts: Displays a list of blog posts with metadata and links, including SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/blog/HowToCompressPdf: Renders a detailed guide article on compressing PDFs online with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/blog/ResizeImageUnder: Blog page explaining why 50KB image limits exist and how to resize an image using the site's resize tool, with links and tips.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with SEO metadata, hero section, tools grid, FAQ, and blog preview.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AddWatermarkPag: Tool page allowing users to upload a PDF, configure watermark text and style, preview it, and generate a watermarked PDF using client-side processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CompressPdfPage: Tool page for uploading and compressing a PDF in-browser, showing progress, FAQs, and related tool links.
Tool page for converting one or more images into a PDF with configurable page size and layout, processed fully in-browser.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MergePdfPage.ts: Tool page that merges multiple PDFs into a single file using client-side processing, with FAQs and related links.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToWordPage.t: Tool page to convert a PDF to a DOCX file with basic text extraction, including validation, processing state, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/RemovePagesPage: React page for removing pages from a PDF, handling file selection, page range parsing, processing, and job state.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizeImagePage: Image resizing tool page with file validation, preview handling, and client-side resize processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizePdfPage.t: PDF page resizing interface allowing users to select a target size and run a browser-based resize process.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SplitPdfPage.ts: PDF splitting tool that extracts each page into separate PDFs and returns a ZIP archive.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WordToPdfPage.t: Word-to-PDF conversion page that validates .docx files, sends them to a backend actor, and outputs a PDF.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements for rebuilding a Word‑to‑PDF tool using a Node.js backend with LibreOffice and a minimal frontend. Lists architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests guiding the rebuild.
